title: Need a computer fixed, just Get Rich!
description:
IT Security Application testing and development local and remote.

-Specializing in low-impact rollouts with white-glove service and passionate attention to detail.

<b>We are not vendor focused. We will always be customer-first.<b/>

home.title: Get Rich!
home.description:
### \
Your office, your cloud server, your website showroom.

### I strive to be the best by doing and learning all things tech. You break. I fix. You relax.

This can be any computer or app. Perhaps you need a software developer, project manager or maybe just a friendly voice to help get you back to work.

I can work from anywhere. I love to protect people from the bad guys and I sleep well knowing that you trust me enough to refer your friends and colleagues.

**Thank You!**

\- Rich
